text:
There's nothing really harder
than starting a two-sided marketplace.

There are days
where you come into the office
and you say, why am I doing this?

We'd spent months
trying to get any seed
or pre-seed funding we could.
We were running out of money.

If we don't figure out funding
in the next month,
we have to call this quits.

One of the things
about running a business

is you've gotta have the cash flow
to be able to keep fighting.

When you're starting out
with $10,000 and a dream

and AWS says, we'll give you
a $100,000 worth of compute,
that was great.
Activate is AWS supporting startups

with credits
and funding and capabilities.

In 2016, Hugging Face
was a young, scrappy startup.

Today we host over a million models,
data sets, applications.

The Activate program
was really important

to help us get
to that first level of scale.

We just have such a breadth
of options available to us
through the AWS ecosystem

that it's less
about technology choice
and more about how big we can think.

I never thought that
we would be almost nine years in

still every day building
as much as we are.

The Activate program
has been invaluable.

Having people come on board early
and believe in your vision

and movement
definitely helps to create momentum.

It's been really powerful
to have a partner like AWS doing that.
